code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{backupAPI}from'../../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BackupRestore=()=>{const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleExport=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);const res=await backupAPI.export();const dataStr=JSON.stringify(res.data,null,2);const dataBlob=new Blob([dataStr],{type:'application/json'});const url=URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);const link=document.createElement('a');link.href=url;link.download="backup-".concat(Date.now(),".json");link.click();URL.revokeObjectURL(url);alert('Data exported successfully!');}catch(error){console.error('Failed to export data:',error);alert('Failed to export data');}finally{setLoading(false);}};const handleImport=async e=>{const file=e.target.files[0];if(!file)return;try{setLoading(true);const text=await file.text();const data=JSON.parse(text);await backupAPI.import(data);alert('Data imported successfully! Please refresh the page.');}catch(error){console.error('Failed to import data:',error);alert('Failed to import data. Please check the file format.');}finally{setLoading(false);e.target.value='';}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-2xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 dark:text-white mb-8",children:"\uD83D\uDCE6 Data Backup & Restore"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-xl shadow-lg p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-white mb-4",children:"Export Data"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400 mb-4",children:"Download all your habits, tasks, and mood data as a JSON file."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleExport,disabled:loading,className:"w-full px-6 py-3 bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white rounded-lg font-medium transition disabled:opacity-50",children:loading?'Exporting...':'Export Data'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-xl shadow-lg p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-white mb-4",children:"Import Data"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400 mb-4",children:"Upload a backup file to restore your data."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"block w-full",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",accept:".json",onChange:handleImport,disabled:loading,className:"hidden"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-full px-6 py-3 bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 text-white rounded-lg font-medium transition text-center cursor-pointer disabled:opacity-50",children:loading?'Importing...':'Import Data'})]})]})]})]});};export default BackupRestore;
